thread.title: JAMF Software Delivers Same-Day Support for iOS 9 With Casper Suite 9.8
thread.title_full: JAMF Software Delivers Same-Day Support for iOS 9 With Casper Suite 9.8

author: admin
title: JAMF Software Delivers Same-Day Support for iOS 9 With Casper Suite 9.8
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/16/2015 @ 10:00 AM Companies mentioned in this article: JAMF Software 
MINNEAPOLIS, MN -- (Marketwired) -- 09/16/15 -- JAMF Software , the leader in Apple device management, today announced same-day support for iOS 9 with Casper Suite 9.8. The move continues JAMF Software's long-standing commitment of providing schools and organizations with all the benefits of the latest Apple technology as soon as possible. 
With continued innovation from Apple, IT teams know Apple operating system updates are always right around the corner. For more than 13 years, thousands of organizations worldwide have relied on the experts at JAMF Software to constantly monitor Apple's newest capabilities and quickly enable them for easy use as soon as possible. 
Today's release allows IT administrators to seamlessly manage rapid migration to iOS 9 performed by end users or via device provisioning workflows. The benefit is more control and less risk as organizations can rely on Casper Suite's inventory, deployment and security features that go beyond other device management solutions. 
The new Casper Suite offers the following: Accurate inventory of all devices migrating to iOS 9 while ensuring that security standards are met Support of new settings and payloads added to iOS 9 configuration profiles, including: trust profiles for in-house enterprise apps, Apple Watch pairing and security, data security with AirDrop and more Simplification of app and content deployment to end users to meet their needs, leveraging common directory services 
Available immediately 
Version 9.8 of the Casper Suite is available as a free upgrade for all customers with up-to-date support and license agreements. Prospective customers interested in purchasing the Casper Suite may contact JAMF Software to receive additional information about evaluating the product in their organization. 
For additional information about iOS 9 management capabilities in the Casper Suite, please visit: http://bit.ly/1JaNG2B 
Since 2002, JAMF Software has been helping users take advantage of the one-of-a-kind Apple ecosystem. JAMF is committed to enabling full use of the Apple platform for consumers, small businesses or large organizations, via behind-the-scenes management software like the Casper Suite and Bushel, plus the 20,000+ member JAMF Nation community . Today, more than 5,500 global customers rely on JAMF to manage nearly 5 million Apple devices. 
Comment on the News "JAMF Software is committed to providing our customers with same-day support for Apple's major releases, ensuring IT administrators can support and manage devices running the new operating system," said Dean Hager, CEO of JAMF Software. "With Casper Suite 9.8, JAMF continues to help schools and businesses succeed with the Apple platform." 
About JAMF Software Since 2002, JAMF Software -- and our Casper Suite solution -- has made it easy for businesses, schools and other enterprises to unleash the power of Apple devices in their organizations. 
Find out why more than 5,500 businesses and schools rely on JAMF Software to nearly 5,000,000 devices across the globe at http://www.jamfsoftware.com . Contact:
